title: When Karthus tries to ult...
body:
https://uploads.disquscdn.com/images/01656578f7e343938273bbbdd7b41221ad4cc4fe9c9d4d2dbe12458d04b240a8.png?w=800&h=352

...but the game doesn't care.

######Credit to Not a real Rumble main OwO for updating this meme

replies.body: {{champion:245}} rewind isnt on there. (Yes i looked through it all...i have no life)

> [{quoted}](name=Eternal Torment,realm=EUW,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=bcnoUZT3,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2017-09-14T16:07:35.935+0000)
>
> {{champion:245}} rewind isnt on there. (Yes i looked through it all...i have no life)

{{champion:26}}  Rewind reduces basic cooldowns. Of course it's not on the list.

i just....noticed my own stupidity...i mixed up the skills...

I meant Chrono break..His R...WHATEVER THE HELL ITS NAMED UGH i cant think straight today, the cold is damaging my brain
It's there. The fourth icon from top left

i see it...my cold officially has made me stupid.

i give up

ff20

> [{quoted}](name=Eternal Torment,realm=EUW,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=bcnoUZT3,comment-id=00010000000000000000,timestamp=2017-09-14T19:18:32.577+0000)
>
> i see it...my cold officially has made me stupid.
> 
> i give up
> 
> ff**_15_**

FTFY
There's always that one little brat that says no to 15 anyway...
Oh that's me, but that's usually because we're only behind like 3 kills when my builds are almost always tailored to the late game.  If we're seriously down, I will say yes.

Wish I had your freaking luck. My games usually go out of control by 10 minutes for one side or the other but my team will still refuse to ff even if we've lost four turrets to their 0, dragons and Herald and my team is flamming each other more than actually playing. Nope, still say no.

I mean I heavily rely on my late game power.  We still almost won a game once against a team that got 3 infernal drakes and was full build, including Ornn items.  My late game power is insane.  I main Xerath, and build such that in the late game, I can threaten to 100-0 the enemy squishies with just my ult.  I myself will fall over from anything more than a slight breeze, but my positioning has improved a lot from this.

I'm also able to get to the late game pretty often even if losing thanks to my reliable waveclear.

I guess its a problem for me since I'm a support main and so even if I do play perfectly, I can't guarantee a win. Especially when so many games I get pounded by everyone and their mother coming bot lane.

Yeah that's why I pretty much only play mid, though I can support if I need to of course (though not as Xerath, please don't take him there).  I just have pretty good control over the flow of the game, assuming my teammates don't keep running into Blitz hooks...

> [{quoted}](name=Eternal Torment,realm=EUW,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=bcnoUZT3,comment-id=00010000000000000000,timestamp=2017-09-14T19:18:32.577+0000)
>
> i see it...my cold officially has made me stupid.
> 
> i give up
> 
> ff20

ff15... you twat go to the doctor at this point xD

AKA one of the coolest ability icons in the entire game. It's either that or Camille W (imo).

https://imgur.com/v6YtMcl

Wish there was a larger version somewhere so it would be easier to appreciate
If you time it right, {{champion:80}} ult dodges it as well.
{{champion:432}}
{{sticker:zombie-nunu-hearts}}

I post this and basically get ignored you post this and it upvote galore 
{{sticker:sg-janna}}
Sounds more like good aim.{{sticker:sg-lulu}}

> [{quoted}](name=Melledoneus,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=bcnoUZT3,comment-id=00070000,timestamp=2017-09-15T01:27:13.864+0000)
>
> Must be magic.
> {{sticker:sg-ezreal}}
> 
> Your next line is "Sounds more like good aim" followed by a Lulu sticker.

SONO CHINO SADAMEEEEE!!!!
You can exclude jannas e now since it's on a 18 second cd.
kek
Also, new XZ ult prevents him from being damaged by anything outside of his protective bubble.
Damn it. I need to call the guys at the memeshop and tell them to update it again.
To be fair, Camille's innate is probably never going to be used to block Karthus' ultimate.
i would incredibly impressed if a camille blocked a Requiem with her passive; like if i was the karthus i wouldn't even be mad.

Whose skill is that at the very bottom left?

edit: nvm Rumble emp W

Ok, to be fair, it requires your Poppy to ult them in order for Keeper's Verdict to keep them from being hit so...

You can be sure your team just hates you if that happens.

I remember a video in which Poppy was saving an enemy from Jinx' ult by doing this accidentilly.
Hilarious when that rocket flies right through them.

You shouldn't put Kled's R in there, but the icon of his passive.
If he is able to use his ultimate, that means he has Skaarl active rn and in that case, it doesn't matter how much damage Karthus' ult deals, since Kled will just dismount and continue to live.
RIP the coolest ult in the game. To forever be trash now.

>  To forever be trash now.

well..it's not a complete trash ult tho. The chances someone will save an ability like this in the middle of a crazy 5v5 teamfight is close to none and a lot of them put you in a bad position afterwards (zhonya)
That's true but god how it feels bad at times.
The ult is pretty good, you was a lot of it's potential if you just use it to finish off someone. My main gripe with it is the CD as the ult is core to karthus and he can hardly use it.

It is a really powerful ult that can team wipe. I do think it's a little low compared to many other powerful ults like Orianna for example but Karthus is an older design when ults weren't all short and CDR wasn't as everywhere.
Still didn't add Morde's passive or Annie's E {{item:3070}}
why would anivias e do anything?
I think you misread it. I put "Annie's E", her Molten Shield
oh shit. Guess I cant read at midnight.
doesn't the shields apply to any other damage source? :p i dun get it
Oh but "hur dur R to pentakill"

Tear, snowball, and season 5 Ryze passive are the biggest offenders.

Wait, does snowball make you invincible?

Seraph's Embrace? 
(Sorry if I missed it. Trying to find any cockblock in particular is like playing a game of "Where's Waldo?")
{{champion:15}} Back off.
{{sticker:sg-soraka}} "I'm sorry, I just wanted to help"

Man I hate this meme; there are so many sarcastic retorts I want to make.

But I won't. Enjoy your laughs.
